result.eng: The restaurant is located at a busy crossroads.
result.ga: Ar chrosaire gnóthach atá an bhialann suite
result.orig: Ar chrosaire gnóthach atá an bhialann suite
result.html: Ar chrosaire gnóthach atá an bhialann suiteThe restaurant is located at a busy crossroads.
result.ponchtml: Ar ċrosaire gnóṫaċ atá an ḃialann suiteThe restaurant is located at a busy crossroads.

result.eng: The secretary was busy writing letters.
result.ga: Bhí an rúnaí gnóthach ag scríobh litreacha
result.orig: Bhí an rúnaí gnóthach ag scríobh litreacha
result.html: Bhí an rúnaí gnóthach ag scríobh litreachaThe secretary was busy writing letters.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí an rúnaí gnóṫaċ ag scríoḃ litreaċaThe secretary was busy writing letters.

result.eng: The restaurant tends to be quite busy at lunchtime.
result.ga: Bíonn an bhialann gnóthach go leor ag am lóin
result.orig: Bíonn an bhialann gnóthach go leor ag am lóin
result.html: Bíonn an bhialann gnóthach go leor ag am lóinThe restaurant tends to be quite busy at lunchtime.
result.ponchtml: Bíonn an ḃialann gnóṫaċ go leor ag am lóinThe restaurant tends to be quite busy at lunchtime.

result.html: Bíonn sí gnóthach i gcónaíShe is always busy.
result.ponchtml: Bíonn sí gnóṫaċ i gcónaíShe is always busy.

result.eng: I can't talk to you, I'm too busy.
result.ga: Ní féidir liom labhairt leat tá mé róghnóthach
result.orig: Ní féidir liom labhairt leat tá mé róghnóthach
result.html: Ní féidir liom labhairt leat tá mé róghnóthachI can't talk to you, I'm too busy.
result.ponchtml: Ní féidir liom laḃairt leat tá mé róġnóṫaċI can't talk to you, I'm too busy.

result.eng: I've been very busy since I was named mayor.
result.ga: Tá mé an-ghnóthach ó ainmníodh i mo mhéara mé
result.orig: Tá mé an-ghnóthach ó ainmníodh i mo mhéara mé

result.ponchtml: Tá mé an-ġnóṫaċ ó ainmníoḋ i mo ṁéara méI've been very busy since I was named mayor.

result.html: Tá mé gnóthach faoi láthairI am busy right now.
result.ponchtml: Tá mé gnóṫaċ faoi láṫairI am busy right now.

result.eng: I am busy at the moment.

result.html: Tá mé gnóthach i láthair na huaireI am busy at the moment.

result.eng: A microblogging service of its kind [ie Twitter] is probably better suited to a busy person who wants to share his opinions.
result.ga: Seans gur fearr a fhóireann seirbhís mhicreabhlagála dá chineál don duine gnóthach atá ag iarraidh tuairimí a nochtadh
